long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Splitz is an exclusive Chrome Extension to help users manage their tabs efficiently.

FEATURES:
- Create categories (Splitz) to organize your tabs
- Drag and drop tabs to whatever order you desire 
- Quickly switch between tabs using keyboard shortcuts
- Add new tabs
- Delete tabs & categories (Splitz)
- Dark Mode

FEEDBACK:
https://forms.gle/Kt9L3FcJWpY69Fzn8

GET IN TOUCH:
splitzdeveloper@gmail.com

The only tab manager you will ever need.
